page.title: 20PEOPLE-NORTH KILWORTH SCHOOL
page.content: ST.ANDREW'S C.E. (A) SCHOOL GOVERNORS Chairman, The Rev.S.W. Doggett M.B.E, T.D.,M.A. Correspondent:Mrs.C.M.Ward C.C. Mr. T. Mattock,Mrs.J.Wright,Mrs. R. Downey B.A. Headmaster: Mr.K.T.Timson B.A.,Dip.R.E.,A.C.P., F.I.S.T.,F.Coll.P. Teaching Staff:Mrs.C.Sumner B.Ed. Mrs.J.Kennedy Cert.Ed. (part-time) Mrs.J.Coomber Cert.Ed. Ancilliary Staff: Mrs B.Walsh-Atkins,Secretary Mrs.C. Moulding,Mrs.B.Munden Dining assts.Mrs.LaRosa,caretaker. 3 Classes,Alpha(infants),Beta(lower juniors)& Gamma(upper juniors) Tom Spicer,Matthew Winter,Rachel Coles and Paul Burrell helped type in the information,the children of gamma class did the interviews.
